[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thirdweb-dev/solana](./solana.md) &gt; [NFTDrop](./solana.nftdrop.md)

## NFTDrop class

A collection of NFTs that can be lazy minted and claimed

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class NFTDrop 
```

## Example


```jsx
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/solana";

const sdk = ThirdwebSDK.fromNetwork("devnet");
sdk.wallet.connect(signer);

// Get the interface for your NFT collection program
const program = await sdk.getNFTCollection("{{contract_address}}");
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [balance(mintAddress)](./solana.nftdrop.balance.md) |  | Get the NFT balance of the connected wallet |
|  [balanceOf(walletAddress, mintAddress)](./solana.nftdrop.balanceof.md) |  | Get the NFT balance of the specified wallet |
|  [claim()](./solana.nftdrop.claim.md) |  | Claim an NFT from the drop with connected wallet |
|  [get(mintAddress)](./solana.nftdrop.get.md) |  | Get the metadata for a specific NFT |
|  [getAll()](./solana.nftdrop.getall.md) |  | Get the metadata for all NFTs on this drop |
|  [getAllClaimed()](./solana.nftdrop.getallclaimed.md) |  | Get the metadata for all the claimed NFTs on this drop |
|  [getMetadata()](./solana.nftdrop.getmetadata.md) |  | Get the metadata for this program. |
|  [lazyMint(metadatas)](./solana.nftdrop.lazymint.md) |  | Lazy mint NFTs to be claimed later |
|  [totalClaimedSupply()](./solana.nftdrop.totalclaimedsupply.md) |  | Get the total claimed supply of this drop |
|  [totalUnclaimedSupply()](./solana.nftdrop.totalunclaimedsupply.md) |  | Get the total unclaimed supply of this drop |
|  [transfer(receiverAddress, mintAddress)](./solana.nftdrop.transfer.md) |  | Transfer the specified NFTs to another wallet |
